action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 445 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 115.
Amendment SA 445 proposed by Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S4678-4686, S4690) text: CR S4681) Relative to port security.
